page.title: 10RECREATION GROUNDS.
page.content: A class of lower infants made visits to 3 local Recreation Grounds. {Warsop Road Ground-}This has a perimeter fence of 221 paces long or 128m,with only 2 gates.Inside is a slide,a roundabout,6 swings.There used to be a play fort but this was vandalised.In about 1 hour we saw 8 adults, (2 with dogs,a couple with a child and a mum with a child.)We also saw two boys on bikes." Should they have been at school?" {Vale Road Ground-}This is next to the Community Centre.It has a large area for ball games, 50 paces long and 35 wide.There is only 1 bench and flower bed.Most of the area is for children. With swings,a rocket,space shuttle, climbing frame,slide and roundabout. There is an old tennis court,and toilets.{The Lord's Ground}is just a field with nothing on it.{Class 2 S.E.
